pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Tidy Implementation of 'ESTIMATE' // The 'ESTIMATE' package infers tumor purity from expression data as a function of immune and stromal infiltrate, but requires writing of intermediate files, is un-pipeable, and performs poorly when presented with modern datasets with current gene symbols. 'tidyestimate' a fast, tidy, modern reimagination of 'ESTIMATE' (2013) doi:10.1038/ncomms3612.
